snippet.title: ✪ Sonic Chronicles: The Dark Brotherhood Flash - Gameplay Showcase ✪
snippet.description:
Welcome to Sonic Chronicles: The Dark Brotherhood Flash! This is an Official Flash Game released by SEGA in 2008. This game was made with the intention of promoting the new upcoming game Sonic Chronicles: The Dark Brotherhood released on the same year for Nintendo DS. This is a recreation of the Sonic Chronicles: The Dark Brotherhood Hub World Maps present in the original game. Due to recent events it was found out that this game is actually a MicroWebsite at the same time, supporting Story details, Characters Bios, Locations Info, Trailers and even Videos with Behind the Scenes, how cool is that? There seems to have been a downloadable mini-game called Sonic Chronicles: Official Game Trainer, however I could not find any info about this one :/ Hope by some magic I can cover it soon ;)

Unfortunately this website can no longer be accessed :(

===Timestamps===
00:00 - Channel Intro
00:13 - Sonic Chronicles Flash Opening
00:53 - Game Information
05:07 - Character Bios
08:50 - Story Summary
10:07 - Chao Overview
11:20 - Sonic Chronicles Map Exploring
14:20 - Locations Details
21:38 - More Map Exploring (looking for the Last Ring)
23:04 - Media Files: Screenshots
26:19 - Media Files: Concept Art
27:46 - Media Files: Icons and Wallpapers
28:31 - Media Files: Trailers and Commercials
36:15 - Media Files: Behind the Scenes
47:01 - Channel Outro
